import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' const OrderScreen = ({match}) => { const orderId = match.params.id const dispatch = useDispatch() // order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const { order, loading, error } = orderDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) }, []) return loading ? : error ? {error} : <>

주문 {order._id}

배송지

주소 : {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

결제 방법

지불 선택 : {order.paymentMethod}

주문 상품

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? 카트가 비었습니다 : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.price}원 X {item.qty}개 = {item.qty * item.price}원 ))} )}

주문 요약

 주문 상품 {order.itemsPrice}원 배송비 {order.shippingPrice}원 관세 및 부과세 {order.taxPrice}원 주문 총액 {order.totalPrice}원 } export default OrderScreen
